content: She sang to the stars while the world burned. I couldn’t stop her. I didn't even try.
Ashes remember better than men. So watch who you trust when the flames die down.
The third seal breaks when the Outlander bleeds willingly. Hope you packed gauze, hero.
He still wears the ring. You know that, right? Like rusted proof he never moved on.

triggerPhrase: What do you see when you close your eyes?
content: They never stop burning. Not in dreams. Not in daylight. Not even when I lie to myself.

triggerPhrase: I heard rumors about the chapel...
content: The wolves wait beneath the chapel. Not dead. Just patient.
Say that again and I’ll show you the ash. I'm all gas, no brakes — like your mom at dawn patrol.

triggerPhrase: Do you think we can win?
content: We? Buddy, I’ve seen friendlies drop faster than bootcamp noodles. Just stay low and let me work.
